ParabankPage.description: This page is the ParaBank homepage, providing access to customer login, services, and information.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the password.

elements.name: Log In Button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

elements.name: Register Link
elements.description: Link to navigate to the registration page.

elements.name: Forgot login info? Link
elements.description: Link to navigate to the forgot login info page.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Welcome to ParaBank'

ParabankRegisterPage.description: This page is used for new users to register for an account with ParaBank.

elements.name: First Name
elements.description: Input field for the user's first name.

elements.name: Last Name
elements.description: Input field for the user's last name.

elements.name: Address
elements.description: Input field for the user's address.

elements.name: City
elements.description: Input field for the user's city.

elements.name: State
elements.description: Input field for the user's state.

elements.name: Zip Code
elements.description: Input field for the user's zip code.

elements.name: Phone Number
elements.description: Input field for the user's phone number.

elements.name: SSN
elements.description: Input field for the user's social security number.

elements.name: Username
elements.description: Input field for the user's desired username.

elements.name: Password
elements.description: Input field for the user's desired password.

elements.name: Confirm Password
elements.description: Input field to confirm the user's desired password.

elements.name: Register Button
elements.description: Button to submit the registration form.

assertions: Header text contains 'Signing up is easy!'
The 'First Name' input field is present
